name: Attack
description:
[Technique]
A basic Expertise for close-range combat.
Strong against: Rush
Weak against: Spin, Guard, Counter,
    Long-range attacks

△: Skill Count↑, Damage↑, Incantation↓

Can be increased up to Class 9

name: Spin
description:
[Technique]
A technical Expertise for attacking multiple
enemies in close-quarters combat.

Strong against: Attack, Counter
Weak against: Guard, Long-range attacks

△: Skill Count↑, Damage↑, Incantation↓

Can be increased up to Class 7

name: Rush
description:
[Technique]
An Expertise that breaks down an opponent's Guard
with a mighty blow.

Strong against: Guard
Weak against: Attack, Counter

△: Skill Count↑, Damage↑, Incantation↓

Can be increased up to Class 7

name: Shot
description:
[Technique]
A basic Expertise for long-distance combat.
Strong against: Attack, Spin,
     Guard, Counter
Weak against: Dodge

△: Skill Count↑, Damage↑, Incantation↓

Can be increased up to Class 9

name: Rapid
description:
[Technique]
A technical Expertise for delivering successive
attacks in long-distance combat.
Strong against: Attack, Spin,
     Guard, Counter
Weak against: Dodge

△: Skill Count↑, Damage↑, Incantation↓

Can be increased up to Class 8

name: Guard
description:
[Technique]
A basic Expertise for protecting oneself from
enemy attacks.
Strong against: Attack, Spin 
Weak against: Rush, Long-range attacks

△: Skill Count↑, Incantation↓

Can be increased up to Class 9

name: Counter
description:
[Technique]
A Technical Expertise for nullifying an enemy's
attack and responding with a counterattack.
Strong against: Attack, Rush
Weak against: Spin, Long-range attacks

△: Skill Count↑, Damage↑, Incantation↓

Can be increased up to Class 9

name: Dodge
description:
[Technique]
A technical Expertise for evading long-distance
attacks and creating an opportunity to respond.
Strong against: Long-range attacks
Weak against: Close-range attacks

△: Skill Count↑, Incantation↓

Can be increased up to Class 9

name: Curative Magic
description:
[Technique]
An Expertise that provides magic to heal allies.

△: Skill Count↑, Recovery↑, Incantation↓

Can be increased up to Class 10

name: Destruction Magic
description:
[Technique]
An Expertise that provides offensive magic to
attack enemies from a distance.
Strong against: Attack, Spin,
     Guard, Counter
Weak against: Dodge

△: Skill Count↑, Damage↑, Incantation↓

Can be increased up to Class 10

name: Support Magic
description:

name: Curse Magic

name: Talk
description:

An Expertise for negotiation. Gently approach and
befriend others.

△: Skill Count↑, Negotiation Success Rate↑

Can be increased up to Class 2

name: Threaten
description:

An Expertise for negotiation. Coerce others into

Can be increased up to Class 2

name: Taunt
description:
[Technique]
An Expertise for negotiation. Provoke an opponent

name: Summon

name: Occultism
description:
[Knowledge]
An Expertise for developing an understanding of

△: Gain Intelligence raising passives

Can be increased up to Class 7

name: Fusion
description:

△: Demon Experience Gain ↑ Every 3 Classes
